getRoleCount().details: Returns the number of roles stored in the contract.

getRoleMemberCount(bytes32).details: Returns the number of members of the specified role.

returns._0: The number of members of the role.

getRoleMembers(bytes32,uint256,uint256).details: Returns the members of the specified role.

params.end: the end index, the value for this index will not be included.
params.start: the start index, the value for this index will be included.

getRoles(uint256,uint256).details: Returns the keys of the roles stored in the contract.

params.end: The ending index of the range of roles to return.
params.start: The starting index of the range of roles to return.

grantRole(address,bytes32).details: Grants the specified role to the given account.

params.key: The key of the role to grant.

hasRole(address,bytes32).details: Returns true if the given account has the specified role.

returns._0: True if the account has the role, false otherwise.

revokeRole(address,bytes32).details: Revokes the specified role from the given account.

params.key: The key of the role to revoke.
